title: Sovereign AGI Core Data Structures for Governance
description: A repository of reusable, standardized JSON Schema definitions for core system types referenced by various policies and configurations.

weight.description: The relative influence weight applied to this metric.

source.description: Source system from which the metric data is derived.

OverrideCondition.description: Defines conditions and associated parameters under which standard policy execution is bypassed or modified.

trigger_id.description: Unique identifier for the triggering event or state.

priority_level.description: Priority level for conflict resolution among multiple simultaneous overrides.
